items.question: What is AUTYVO Trace?
items.answer: AUTYVO Trace is the system that transforms your daily management into certified value. Every action you document becomes verifiable proof for future buyers.

items.question: How does the verification engine work?
items.answer: Our engine cross-references your data with official sources (SIV, Histovec) to guarantee the authenticity of your vehicle's history. It's an independent trusted third party.

items.question: What is Bridge Dev?
items.answer: Bridge Dev is the feature that allows you to generate a complete and verified history report of your vehicle, ready to be shared with potential buyers.

items.question: Is the app free?
items.answer:
Yes, the app is FREE for life! Use all the tools to manage your vehicle and build your complete history without ever paying anything.

AUTYVO Trace Certified is a Premium service. Our verification guarantee is so powerful that it monetizes upon resale. You only pay to transform your history into concrete and tamper-proof proof of value.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We comply with GDPR and your data is encrypted. You keep full control over what you share and with whom.
